Sentencas: The development of cathode materials with high oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) activity is crucial to realize the wide application of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: Nd-doped SrFeO3-delta (SNF) two-phase nanocomposite was fabricated by a dopant-induced in situ self-assembly process.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: The SNF nanocomposite comprises 63.4 wt% perovskite main phase (P-SNF) and 36.6 wt% Ruddlesden-Popper second phase (RP-SNF).
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: The average thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of SrFeO3-delta is reduced by 36.5 % and down to 13.9 x 10-6 K-1.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, SNF demonstrates an impressive output power of 779 mW cm-2, which is twice that of the single-phase SrFeO3-delta.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: The superior performance stems from the heterointerface effect of the in situ self-assembled two phases.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: This effect increases the content of oxygen vacancies, thereby enhancing both chemical oxygen surface exchange coefficient and bulk diffusion coefficient.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: Moreover, the SNF composite exhibits excellent CO2 tolerance than the single-phase SrFeO3-delta.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode

Sentencas: This work presents a promising avenue for exploring multifunctional materials through interface engineering, offering new possibilities for future energy conversion devices.
Titulo: Nd-doping-induced perovskite/Ruddlesden-Popper heterointerfaces boost the ORR activity and CO2 tolerance for SrFeO3-δ-based cathode
